","type":"text/plain"},"$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish/readme","text":"Installation and usage tutorial is available at [[TiddlyMemo Manual|https://tiddlymemo.org/manual/#Included%20plugins]].

可在 [[墨屉手册|https://tiddlymemo.org/manual/zh-Hans#相关插件]] 查看安装使用教程。","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki"},"$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish/buttons/import/cannedfish":{"title":"$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish/buttons/import/cannedfish","tags":"$:/tags/FishingBait","caption":"{{$:/language/fishing-cannedfish/cannedfish}}","description":"{{$:/language/fishing-cannedfish/cannedfishtip}}","condition":"[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/FishingBait]!is[draft]first[]]","text":"<$list
    filter="$:/config/CannedfishLibrary"
>
    <$action-sendmessage
        $message="tm-load-plugin-library"
        url={{!!url}}
        infoTitlePrefix="$:/temp/RemoteAssetInfo/"
    />
    <$action-sendmessage
        $message="tm-modal"
        $param="$:/Import/cannedfish"
        currentTiddler=<<currentTiddler>>
    />
    <$action-popup
        $state=<<qualify "$:/state/popup/$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingdeck">>
        $coords=""
    />
</$list>"},"$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish/icon","tags":"$:/tags/Image","text":"<svg width="22pt" height="22pt" class="tc-image-home-button tc-image-button" viewBox="0 0 128 128" version="1.1" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
    <g id="catchfish">
        <path d="M0 0L128 0L128 128L0 128L0 0Z" id="Background" fill-opacity="0" fill-rule="evenodd" stroke="none" />
        <g clip-path="url(#mask_1)">
            <path d="M81.9643 81.5336C81.8143 81.6686 81.9494 81.8187 81.7994 81.9538C79.3101 88.5414 72.5437 92.1892 65.9268 92.9858L65.0715 92.941C64.0811 92.7462 63.7058 91.7259 63.9006 90.7355C64.4552 88.3347 63.8844 85.5889 62.1136 83.9238C60.4029 83.8342 58.7073 83.4594 57.0117 83.0846C46.0126 80.2213 33.977 72.5865 29.9832 61.5139C27.0856 54.0721 27.6989 45.0991 29.6778 37.3412C29.8577 36.6359 30.3077 36.2307 31.0279 36.1255C32.0481 35.7502 33.0236 36.2301 33.2489 37.3854C33.895 41.4216 34.5417 48.1736 37.6635 51.3389C40.0487 49.4627 42.9893 47.9016 46.0501 46.7755C47.9406 46.1599 48.6614 48.7706 47.5963 50.0013C45.3012 52.8827 42.7665 57.6097 43.4126 61.6459C44.3294 68.698 50.0157 66.566 55.0417 63.3989C53.661 62.4688 52.2804 61.5389 50.5997 60.879C49.4892 60.249 48.5735 58.6288 49.9088 57.6982C54.2294 54.3511 60.0813 54.5149 65.1383 56.2093C65.2733 56.3593 65.6936 56.5243 65.8286 56.6743C75.3556 52.1708 85.7989 52.0033 96.5578 53.9966C96.6929 54.1466 96.8429 54.0115 96.978 54.1615C103.106 51.2239 98.8907 57.492 98.5092 57.6723C99.337 69.1508 91.7616 77.3301 81.9643 81.5336ZM64 0L118.56 32L118.56 96L64 128L9.44 96L9.44 32L64 0L64 0Z" id="Shape" fill-rule="evenodd" stroke="none" />
        </g>
    </g>
</svg>"},"$:/language/fishing-cannedfish/cannedfishlibrary":{"title":"$:/language/fishing-cannedfish/cannedfishlibrary","text":"Learning Pack Plugin Library"},"$:/language/fishing-cannedfish/cannedfishlibrarytip":{"title":"$:/language/fishing-cannedfish/cannedfishlibrarytip","text":"This plugin library can be used to install and update Learning Pack."},"$:/language/fishing-cannedfish/cannedfish":{"title":"$:/language/fishing-cannedfish/cannedfish","text":"Learning Pack"},"$:/language/fishing-cannedfish/cannedfishtip":{"title":"$:/language/fishing-cannedfish/cannedfishtip","text":"Packaged tiddlers for easy use and sharing, also called Canned Fish."},"$:/config/CannedfishLibrary":{"title":"$:/config/CannedfishLibrary","caption":"{{$:/language/fishing-cannedfish/cannedfishlibrary}}","tags":"$:/tags/PluginLibrary","url":"https://oflg.github.io/fishing-cannedfish/library/","text":"{{$:/language/fishing-cannedfish/cannedfishlibrarytip}}"},"$:/Import/cannedfish":{"title":"$:/Import/cannedfish","footer":"<$button message="tm-close-tiddler"><$action-sendmessage $message="tm-unload-plugin-library" url={{!!url}}/><$action-deletetiddler $filter="[prefix[$:/temp/ServerConnection/$(PluginLibraryURL)$]][prefix[$:/temp/RemoteAssetInfo/$(PluginLibraryURL)$]]"/>{{$:/language/Buttons/Close/Caption}}</$button>","subtitle":"<$transclude field="caption"/>","text":"\import $:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Modals/AddPlugins

<<display-server-assets "plugin">>"}}}
